tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medical_data (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    data_record JSONB,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE medical_devices ( device_id INT, device_name VARCHAR(255), patient_id INT, device_status VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE electronic_health_records ( record_id INT, patient_id INT, admission_date DATE, discharge_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE patient_information ( patient_id INT, patient_name VARCHAR(255), age INT, diagnosis VARCHAR(100) );

CREATE TABLE devices (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 device_name STRING,
 patient_id UUID,
 recorded_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE health_records (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id UUID,
 record_date DATE,
 diagnosis STRING,
 prescription STRING
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name STRING,
 dob DATE,
 gender STRING
)

CREATE TABLE device_data_sync (
 device_id UUID,
 record_id UUID,
 sync_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE device_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  data_time TIMESTAMP,
  data_type VARCHAR(255),
  data_value TEXT
);
